name: Houndstone
flavorText: Houndstone spends most of its time sleeping in graveyards. Among all the dog Pokémon, this one is most loyal to its master.

previous.name: Greavard
previous.flavorText: It is said that a dog Pokémon that died in the wild without ever interacting with a human was reborn as this Pokémon.

next.name: Flamigo
next.flavorText: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.
